application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by conditions 5 (SuDS) and 11 (trees and landscaping) of planning permission ref. PP/21/03928 dated 10th September 2021 (Formation of terracing and steps within rear garden, single storey rear extension at lower ground floor level with balcony/terrace above, alterations to front elevation including provision of railing to light well retaining wall and new portico to front entrance door, enlargement and reconfiguration of windows and external doors to front and rear elevations, raising of incline to existing entrance drive, widening existing access to driveway and provision of new sliding gates and brickwork piers, and new air conditioning plant on existing flat roof).
